name: Dimensional Ripper - Everlook
tooltip:
Dimensional Ripper - Everlook
Item Level 55
Binds when used
Trinket
Requires Engineering (260)
Requires Goblin Engineer
Use: Rips the dimensional walls asunder and transports you to Everlook in Winterspring.   There are technical problems that sometimes occur, but that's what Goblin Engineering is all about! (4 Hrs Cooldown)
Sell Price: 50
